players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, watch out! I'm the mafioso. Stay cautious."
You: "Charlie, thanks for the warning. Bob, consider who you trust after tonight."
Charlie: "Bob, you're mafioso. Alice & I will protect the town."
You: "Bob, consider your actions. Charlie & I aim to protect the town."
Bob: "I'll target Alice next. Trust Charlie, he's on our side."
Charlie: "Bob, cautious of Alice. Charlie & I work to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

You killed Diana.

Alice: "Charlie, thanks for the warning. Bob, consider who you trust after tonight."
Charlie: "Bob, you're mafioso. Alice & I will protect the town."
Alice: "Bob, consider your actions. Charlie & I aim to protect the town."
You: "I'll target Alice next. Trust Charlie, he's on our side."
Charlie: "Bob, cautious of Alice. Charlie & I work to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Charlie, thanks for the warning. Bob, consider who you trust after tonight."
You: "Bob, you're mafioso. Alice & I will protect the town."
Alice: "Bob, consider your actions. Charlie & I aim to protect the town."
Bob: "I'll target Alice next. Trust Charlie, he's on our side."
You: "Bob, cautious of Alice. Charlie & I work to protect the town."
